channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform

item.title: CVE-2022-29619|2024-08-03T06:26:06.642Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: Under certain conditions SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform 4.x - versions 420,430 allows user Administrator to view, edit or modify rights of objects it doesn't own and which would otherwise be restricted.

item.title: CVE-2022-27671|2024-08-03T05:32:59.850Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: A CSRF token visible in the URL may possibly lead to information disclosure vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-28213|2024-08-03T05:48:37.547Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: When a user access SOAP Web services in SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform - version 420, 430, it does not sufficiently validate the XML document accepted from an untrusted source, which might result in arbitrary files retrieval from the server and in successful exploits of DoS.

item.title: CVE-2022-27667|2024-08-03T05:32:59.924Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: Under certain conditions, SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence platform, Client Management Console (CMC) - version 430, allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted, leading to Information Disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2022-22541|2024-08-03T03:14:55.643Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform - versions 420, 430, may allow legitimate users to access information they shouldn't see through relational or OLAP connections. The main impact is the disclosure of company data to people that shouldn't or don't need to have access.
